package.name: camera_info_manager_node
package.description: Simple package that uses 'camera_info_manager_py' to provide a reconfigurable node capable of publishing a camera_info topic without a camera driver. Useful for bag files where you forgot to bag the camera info data, for situations where a robot provides a default calibration but you'd like to try a different calibration, and more.
package.author: Jarvis Schultz
